transcript: a buddy of mine sold his company for a couple billion and he's been in a little bit of like a rut since then yeah kind of interesting after people self a lot of money why do you feel like they go into a depression or a funk after they sell a billion dollar company they lose the vision I think the vision is another word for hope so hope for a better future and you basically give that away to someone and then the Hope ended up yielding you more than the money ever does but he said this one thing to me I'm just looking for my next big bone to non and that visual for whatever reason like stuck to me and so I'm like I've seen a big bone To None knowing that I'll never chew through the entire bone but being pumped every day to just get a little bit further
